channel.title: <![CDATA[ Gremlin RSS Feed ]]>
channel.description: <![CDATA[ Prevent outages, innovate faster, and earn customer trust with Gremlin’s Reliability Management and Chaos Engineering platform. ]]>

item.title: 【Now in private beta: Gremlin Service Mesh Extension】现在在私人Beta：Gremlin Service网格扩展
item.description: 【Find out how to safely test applications and services behind service meshes with the Gremlin Service Mesh Extension.】找出如何与Gremlin Service网格扩展名一起安全地测试服务网格背后的应用程序和服务。

item.title: 【Manage your reliability work more easily with Gremlin’s newest features】使用Gremlin的最新功能更轻松地管理您的可靠性
item.description: 【Gremlin has three new ways to help you monitor and manage your reliability efforts. See how to track current, future, and past activity in Gremlin.】Gremlin有三种新方法来帮助您监视和管理可靠性工作。查看如何跟踪Gremlin中的当前，未来和过去的活动。

item.title: 【Release Roundup November 2024: Reliability in the serverless and AI era】发布综述2024年11月：无服务器和AI时代的可靠性
item.description: 【A review of the major product and feature releases from September to November 2024, including Service Mesh via Failure Flags, AWS PrivateLink in Marketplace, RM & FI scheduling improvements, and agent updates.】从2024年9月至11月对主要产品的审查和功能发行，包括通过故障标志，Marketplace的AWS PrivateLink，RM＆FI计划改进以及代理更新。

item.title: 【Gremlin's 2024 year-end Release Roundup】Gremlin的2024年末发布综述
item.description: 【This is a mega-roundup of everything Gremlin's released in 2024. From AWS to serverless to all-new experiments, it's all here!】这是Gremlin于2024年发布的所有内容。从AWS到无服务器再到全新的实验，都在这里！

item.title: 【Announcing Gremlin Private Edition】宣布Gremlin私人版
item.description: 【Gremlin Private Edition is a private, secure, self-hosted Gremlin instance that runs entirely within your network. Learn more in our announcement blog.】Gremlin Private Edition是一个私人，安全，自主的Gremlin实例，完全在您的网络中运行。在我们的公告博客中了解更多信息。

item.title: 【Reliable AI models, simulations, and more with Gremlin's GPU experiment】Gremlin的GPU实验可靠的AI模型，模拟等等
item.description: 【Build more resilient machine learning and AI models, video streaming, simulations, and more with Gremlin’s GPU experiment.】通过Gremlin的GPU实验来构建更多有弹性的机器学习和AI模型，视频流，模拟等。

item.title: 【What’s the ROI of reliability?】可靠性的投资回报率是多少？
item.description: 【Learn how to compute the ROI of a reliability or Chaos Engineering program, including how to quantify the positive impact your efforts created for the company.】了解如何计算可靠性或混乱工程计划的投资回报率，包括如何量化对公司创造的积极影响。

item.title: 【How the Gremlin agent fails safely】Gremlin代理如何安全失败
item.description: 【Reliability testing shouldn’t feel risky. Learn how Gremlin makes testing safer with fail-safe agents and automatic rollbacks.】可靠性测试不应该感到冒险。了解Gremlin如何通过故障安全代理和自动回滚使测试更安全。

item.title: 【Maximizing your reliability on AWS】最大化您对AWS的可靠性
item.description: 【Learn how to maximize reliability when running workloads on Amazon EC2, EKS, ECS, and other services.】在亚马逊EC2，EKS，EC和其他服务上运行工作负载时，了解如何最大化可靠性。

item.title: 【How to fix the root cause of a failed reliability test】如何修复失败可靠性测试的根本原因
item.description: 【You’ve run your reliability tests, and unfortunately, some of them failed. No need to panic: we’ll tell you how to turn that F into an A.】您已经进行了可靠性测试，不幸的是，其中一些失败了。无需惊慌：我们会告诉您如何将F变成A。
